Title: Extends the effectiveness of provisions of law relating to permissible fees in connection with open end loans
Summary: Extends the effectiveness of provisions of law relating to permissible fees in connection with open end loans from June 30, 2025 until June 30, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 223 of the laws of 1996 amending the banking law relating to permissible fees in connection with open end loans, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
